quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Whitney Houston and Song
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, conflict, award-winning. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of Whitney Houstons albums became the first album by a female artist to debut at number one on the Billboard 200 albums chart?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Whitney

questions.question: The following lyrics are from the song Used Heart for Sale: Cindy picked up where Peggy left off,  whoa how she make it sine..soon after then, some mutual friend robbed miss Cindy blind.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Clive Davis, the head of this record label, was so impressed when he saw 20-year-old Whitney Houston perform that he offered her a worldwide recording contract.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arista Records

questions.question: Which of Gary Allans songs contains these lyrics?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cant Do It Today

questions.question: Who did Whitney Houston dedicate the song Greatest Love of All to?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Muhammad Ali

questions.question: What influential singer was Whitney Houstons godmother?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Aretha Franklin

questions.question: I would go back to her time after time..man I must have been out of my mind..

options.text: e these lyrics from the song Cryin For Nothin ?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Who wrote the song I Will Always Love You, which Whitney Houston covered in 1992 for The Bodyguard soundtrack?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dolly Paton

questions.question: In what war conflict was the USA involved when Whitney Houston performed her great rendition of The Star Spangled Banner at Super Bowl XXV?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Persian Gulf War

questions.question: Which of these songs is NOT correctly matched with the performer who sang a duet with Whitney Houston?

options.text: If I Told You That - Elton John
Same Script, Different Cast - Deborah Cox
Could I Have This Kiss Forever - Enrique Iglesias

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: If I Told You That - Elton John

questions.question: The Emmy Award-winning song One Moment in Time was recorded by Whitney Houston for which of the following events?

options.text: the launch of the Space Shuttle Endeavour
Nancy Reagans Just Say No Campaign

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the 1988 Summer Olympics

questions.question: In October 1994, Whitney Houston performed at a state dinner in the White House honoring this political leader.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nelson Mandela

questions.question: The Blue Danube Waltz was written in 1866 by this composer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: J. S. Strauss

questions.question: He died in abject poverty, although he wrote My Old Kentucky Home (Old Folks at Home), Beautiful Dreamer, Camptown Races and many other popular songs in the USA during the 19th century.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stephen C. Foster

questions.question: In what movie does Whitney Houston portray a TV producer in love with a married man?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Waiting to Exhale

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Duran Duran and Jerry Garcia
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, bar. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

options.text: Simon Le Bon and John Taylor

questions.question: What did Jerry Garcia discover at the age of 15 that was just what he was looking for to have fun?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: marijuana

questions.question: How are Duran Duran members John Taylor, Roger Taylor, and Andy Taylor related?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Theyre not  related at all.

questions.question: Andy Taylor and John Taylors band made a guest spot on what uber-popular 80s show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Miami Vice

options.text: t the struggles make you stronger, and the changes make you wise..and happiness has its own way of takin its sweet time..

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Life Aint Always Beautiful

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What was Jerry Garcias main instrument from 1960-1964?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Banjo

questions.question: Which of these traumatic events occured during Jerry Garcias youth and changed his life forever?

options.text: He was involved in a car accident in which a good friend of his was killed.
He lost half of his middle finger in a wood cutting accident.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: all of these

questions.question: They say nothin lasts forever, honey Ive got news..whoever said that never got the blues from you..

options.text: e these lyrics from Gary Allans song Forever and a Day?

options.text: d Ive fought it all my life, and the battles now a war..but Ill get up tomorrow and Ill fight it all once more.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Devils Candy

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Rum Runner

questions.question: Jerry Garcia was a straight A student in school.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Jerry Garcia was dishonorably discharged from the army because he frequently went AWOL.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Bow and Song
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, title, woody. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the title of Bow Wows debut album?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beware of Dog

questions.question: In what 2002 movie did Bow Wow play a character named Calvin Cambridge?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Like Mike

questions.question: This gent sang a song written by Woody Bowles called Youre The Hangnail In My Life, And I Cant Bite You Off. Although he wrote songs for others, his solo Della and the Dealer never broke into the top 10 country hits. He and his mom were inducted into the Oklahoma Country Hall of Fame in 2007. There are not many people with his first name. Whats his full name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hoyt Axton

questions.question: Which band was Jerry Garcia a member of?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: all of these

questions.question: What is Bow Wows middle name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gregory

questions.question: Did Bow Wow start rapping at the age of 13?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: What city is Bow Wow from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Reynoldsburg

questions.question: The name of Bow Wows record company is LBW Entertainment.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: His father Earl played banjo with Lester Flatt and he sang You Can Lock Me Up In Jail  Throw Away the Key, But You Cant Keep My Face From Breaking Out. He made his first recording at the age of 13. What is his name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Randy Scruggs

questions.question: LBW entertainment stands for Lil Bow Wow entertainment.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: When was rapper Bow Wow born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: March 9, 1987

questions.question: What is the name of the rapper who gave Bow Wow his name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Snoop Dogg

questions.question: Jerry Garcias father was born in Mexico.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: You Done Stomped On My Heart (and You Mashed That Sucker Flat) was sung and recorded by John Denver. Who wrote the song?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mason Williams

questions.question: Which one of these artists did Bow Wow not collaborate with prior to 2007?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mario

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Aaliyah and Song
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, nicknames, country. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Finish the lyrics of Aaliyahs song Try again: Would you give up or try again if...

options.text: ...I ever said it hurt back then
...I told you that I had a man

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ...I hesitate to let you in

questions.question: This lovely lady released You Aint Woman Enough To Take My Man and Dont Come Home a-Drinkin With Lovin on Yo-Mind. Her first and last name initials match. Who is she?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Loretta Lynn

questions.question: Rumor has it that Aaliyah was secretly married to this RB star:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: R. Kelly

questions.question: What is the meaning of the name Aaliyah?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ascending

questions.question: When was Aaliyah born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: January 16, 1979

questions.question: This dude got into a big to-do with the Dixie Chicks and their lead singer about comments she made about President George W. Bush. His first single in 1993 was entitled Shouldve Been a Cowboy. Some folks confuse his last name with his first. Can you pick the correct name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Toby Keith

questions.question: This country singer, nicknamed The Possum, wrote the song You Changed Your Name From Brown to Jones And Mine From Black to Blue, which was performed by Elvis Costello. He was the husband of Tammy Wynette and also had a nickname caused by his failure to show up at performances because of his alcoholic and cocaine addictions. Who is he?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Jones

questions.question: You Cant Roller Skate In A Buffalo Herd is a song by the Dang Me artist who is King of the Road and one of the reasons England Swings. Who is he?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Roger Miller

questions.question: With which one of these artists did Aaliyah not collaborate throughout her career?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Janet Jackson

questions.question: In the 2002 Queen of the Damned movie Aaliyah starred as this controversial but very charismatic character:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Queen Akasha

questions.question: Aaliyahs first major movie role was in Romeo Must Die where she starred alongside this movie star.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jet Li

questions.question: Aaliyah had many nicknames, but this one doesnt refer to her.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leenah

questions.question: What is Aaliyahs real full name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Aaliyah Dana Haughton

questions.question: This ladys song Youre a Hard Dog To Keep Under The Porch was a Top 20 single along with Boys Like You. In 2001 she, along with 20 other artists, organized a tribute to country singer Webb Pierce, which resulted in his induction into the Country Music Hall of Fame. She is considered one of the most influential country artists and was the first female recording producer. What is her name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gail Davies

questions.question: When did Aaliyah pass away?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: August 25, 2001

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The members of Linkin Park

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Broadway musicals

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paranoia

questions.question: Janet Damita Jo Jackson was born in Gary, Indiana. In what state was she raised as a child?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lies

questions.question: At the 1999 World Music Awards, Janet Jackson received the Legend Award for lifelong contribution to the music industry and outstanding contribution to the pop industry, alongside this iconic artist.

options.text: ...Im in love with the inner being
...you bring out all the best of me

questions.question: What was Janet Jackson mostly criticized for in the beginning of her career, as well as later on?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Her voice

questions.question: What song by Janet Jackson was included in the soundtrack of the 1992 movie Mo Money?

options.text: The Best Things in Life Are Free

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Best Things in Life Are Free

questions.question: What album of Janet Jackson was described as an autobiographical tale about her life with her parents, her first marriage, and breaking free?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Control

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Album and Song
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, vocalist, theory. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This electronic genre of music is also known as Bristol sound or Bristol acid rap.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Trip hop

questions.question: This Sheffield Record Label, founded in 1989, is famous for its numerous alternative electronic artists, such as Aphex Twin.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Warp Records

questions.question: Which of these electronic music groups is responsible for the albums The Fat of the Land and Music for the Jilted Generation?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Prodigy

questions.question: This French electronic musical duo is famous for hiding their faces behind robot masks.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Daft Punk

questions.question: This English electronic group featured Skye Edwards as a vocalist, until she was replaced by Daisy Martey in 2005.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Morcheeba

questions.question: The song Cure For The Itch from Linkin Parks album Hybrid Theory mainly features band member Rob Bourdon using techno, synth, and scratch pad elements.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: This French composer, born on 24 August 1948, is regarded as one of the pioneers of electronic music.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jean Michel Jarre

questions.question: The song By Myself off of Linkin Parks album Hybrid Theory is the only song on the album that does not feature lead singer Chester Bennington screaming.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: The 1998 album Mezzanine was the creation of this Trip hop band.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Massive Attack

questions.question: Where was Seal born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: London, England

questions.question: This English big beat artist is also known under the name Norman Cook.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fatboy Slim

questions.question: This genre in electronic music was developed by the dance club DJs in Chicago in the early 80s of the 20th century.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: House

questions.question: The song Pushing Me Away from Linkin Parks album Hybrid Theory was never released as a single from that album. However, its reinterpretation was released as a single on the bands remix album Reanimation.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: This English electronic music group, consisting of Tom Rowlands and Ed Simons, was first known as The Dust Brothers.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Chemical Brothers

questions.question: The song Forgotten from Linkin Parks album Hybrid Theory is one of the most rap-oriented songs on the album. Who does the rapping in Linkin Park?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mike Shinoda
